ing: 1 1/2 pounds shoulder or butt pork roast
1/4 teaspoon Spice IslandsÂ® Crushed Red Pepper
1/4 teaspoon Spice IslandsÂ® Fine Grind Black Pepper
des: "Pork roast slow cooked in a sweet and spicy barbecue sauce makes for a crowd-pleasing platter of pulled pork sliders."
ins:
Cut roast into 3 to 4 pieces.  Place pork in a greased or lined slow cooker.  Combine remaining ingredients and pour over pork.
Cover and cook on HIGH for 3 to 4 hours or LOW for 6 to 7 hours until pork is very tender.  Shred with 2 forks.  Serve on rolls, topping with coleslaw if desired.
